Package it.polimi.ingsw.snapshots

Class PublicPlayerSnapshot

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.ingsw.snapshots.PublicPlayerSnapshot
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    PrivatePlayerSnapshot
    public class PublicPlayerSnapshot
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    This class contains info relative to a player (who is not the current player) that clients are going to need. All the info present in this class is accessible even by the other players. It implements Serializable in order to be able to be sent to the client.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      int blueAmmo
      String that represents the amount of blue ammo the player has available

      String that represents the color associated with the player
      private java.util.List<java.lang.String> damage
      List of strings that represents the amount of damage the player currently has.
      int finalFrenzy
      Boolean that represents whether the player has access to the bonuses granted by the final frenzy condition
      int loadedWeaponsNumber
      Integer used to represent the amount of loaded weapons that the player has.

      List of strings that represents the amount of marks the player currently has.

      String that represents the name associated with the player

      Integer used to represent the amount of powerup cards that the player has.

      String that represents the amount of red ammo the player has available
      int skull
      String that represents the number of deaths of the player
      private java.util.List<java.lang.String> unloadedWeapons
      List of strings which represents, by name, all the unloaded weapons the player has.
      private java.util.List<java.lang.String> unloadedWeaponsCost
      List of strings which represent the costs associated with every unloaded weapon the player has.
      int yellowAmmo
      String that represents the amount of yellow ammo the player has available

      • damage

        private final java.util.List<java.lang.String> damage
        List of strings that represents the amount of damage the player currently has. Every string is a color, which associates the damage with another player

        private final java.util.List<java.lang.String> mark
        List of strings that represents the amount of marks the player currently has. Every string is a color, which associates the mark with another player

    • Constructor Detail

      • PublicPlayerSnapshot

        public PublicPlayerSnapshot​(Player player,
                            boolean finalFrenzy)
        Constructor. It collects all the info relative to the player that is visible by the other players.
        Parameters:
        player - Players from which the infos are going to be selected.
        finalFrenzy - It say if the match has reached the Final Frenzy mode.
